1.content:
“Guess you picked the wrong sidewalk to head home on, huh?” You smirked, clenching your fist tighter. The tiny you’d snatched off the ground fought fruitlessly, banging his miniscule fists into your thumb. You could barely feel him, but damn if it wasn’t hilarious watching him struggle.

“SCREW YOU!” The tiny screamed up at you, bug-sized face full of hatred. Your smirk only grew.

“Listen, man, I had a pretty crappy day at work.” You sighed theatrically. “A full shift on my feet taking orders kills a girl. Your only purpose here is to cheer me up, okay?” You flicked his head with your free hand, watching with enjoyment as his squishy face dented inward.

After a second, the tiny’s head reformed, enabling him to talk again. “You’re sick! I’m a person, just like you! Why are you doing this?”

You scoffed. “A person? Uh…definitely not. You’re a bug, at best, and a worthless piece of trash freak at worst. You’re like an insignificant little speck.” Your grin widened. “Frankly, from where I’m standing, I’d say that tinies like you deserve to live a cruel life. Little one-inch insect.”

The tiny, remarkable, looked even angrier than before. Usually they broke by now, and frequently they begged you to let them go. However, this tiny did the absolute most unexpected thing. In a final fit of rage, he raked his fingernails into your skin, cutting open a gash on your thumb. The wound was very small, but it stung like hell, and started leaking blood instantly.

“OW! You freak!” You cried out, crushing the tiny up into a ball in your fist. Before you could finish squishing him, the struggling tiny spat derisively at you, a glob of his saliva splattering into your open wound. You didn’t notice though, too preoccupied with reducing him to a crumbled blob in your fist. Steam was practically billowing out of your ears; you were so mad.

Taking a few deep breaths to calm yourself down, you steadied your rising aggression levels. You wiped the blood from the cut on your thumb, and then gently licked the wound, trying to stop any further bleeding. No way you’d give the tiny any satisfaction of victory by putting a band-aid on it. Speaking of…

Walking over to your car, you paused by the closest sewer grate and callously flicked the tiny inside, watching as he fell into the dank darkness of the sewer line down below. You’d hoped for a more creative plan with that tiny, but you were way too fed up with him by now. All you wanted to do was just get home, grab some things, and head over to one of your friend’s houses for a party tonight.

As you drove back home, your mind kept thinking about the crappy day you’d had. Honestly, it wasn’t all that different from most days. Lengthy shifts at the local diner, “Dining Delights”, took up all your time from Monday to Friday. At least it was the weekend now. Your best friend, Yumi Hada, had looked cute in her waitress uniform, which was a plus, but she always looked cute. You’d never admit that you had a crush on her to her face though, paralyzed with fear that it would ruin your friendship with her if she didn't feel the same way about you...and, in your mind, why would she?

Honestly, the more you thought about it, the more you felt your life had fallen into an inescapable rut of disappointment since graduating from Owenton High School. You’d hoped to just get a job for some extra cash until your vlog took off, but so far you weren’t averaging more than twenty or so viewers. As such, you’d been stuck working as a waitress for nearly two full years with no end in sight. This made you a bit jaded and self-conscious. Add it to the mental list of things you were self-conscious about then: Your below-average height, slim and less-pronounced curves, and dead-end job.

At least tinies always made things better (this particular night an exception to that). You weren’t sure when your distaste of tinies began. Maybe it was when you kept playing with them like little dolls in elementary school. Maybe it was when a tiny kept calling your terrible names until you put him in his place in middle school. Maybe it was when you found how fun it was to watch others unknowingly torment tinies thanks to your meddling, a technique you developed in high school. Regardless, the cruel treatment of tinies was practically your pastime.

Pulling into your driveway, your car again made weird sputtering noises, a sure sign it needed a visit to the car shop soon. Groaning, you got out of the car and headed into your house, which was a standard but sizable two-floor house. The bottom floor contained the living room, kitchen, washroom, and a bathroom, while the second floor had five bedrooms and a second bathroom. Your backyard had a small inground pool.

You didn’t make it two steps into the house before you were pulled into a suffocatingly tight embrace and showered with kisses. Two things clued you off that it was your mother doing this to you. One, only she’d be this overbearing with her affection. Two, it was impossible not to notice the two massive breasts squishing around your head, a consequence of the height disparity between you and her.

“Alright, mom, I get it.” You said, pushing away from her, while not completing fighting down a smile. It WAS nice to be loved, after all.
Priscilla Hayes smiled brilliantly at you. “Oh, but I could just keep loving you forever, Alex! You’re gone from home so long during the work week!”

You shrugged. “It is what it is. I’m about to leave again, actually. A party down the street.”

Your mom pouted in an over-exaggerated manner. At 44 years old, she really could still act like a child. Even still, she was the greatest mom that anyone could ever ask for. She was doting, sure, but her over-affectionate nature meant you were always well taken care of. It was also impossible to not take note of your mother’s extremely curvaceous, hourglass figure. How she maintained it at her age was beyond you, but it was crazy impressive. You only wish she’d passed it onto you.

From behind you, a voice cried out. “Hey, what’s up, Alex?”

You turned to face the voice, only to have your head slammed into another sizable chest, this was considerably more toned but no less big. You pushed back again, glaring up at the towering figure of your older sister, August.

“Stop doing that, August. It’s annoying.” You sighed, but your words only prompted a chuckle from your older sister.

“Can’t get through a day without being called ‘annoying’ sis! It’s my favorite part of the day!” August joked, laughing melodically.

August was the spitting image of your mother when she was in her youth, give or take a little bit. 26 years old, and August was easily the tallest Hayes woman, standing at 6’0”. She was almost indescribably beautiful, her deeply tanned skin and auburn hair immaculate. Her curves were only a little smaller than your mother’s, but were also leaner and more toned, a sign of August’s lifestyle. She loved to exercise, and was also the gym teacher and swim coach at Owenton High School.

Slipping out from behind August, one final girl grinned at you happily. You smiled back at her.

“Penny! How’d your first week of senior year go?” You asked her.

August scoffed, feigning offense. "MY week of teaching was good too! Why didn't you ask me, huh?" She grinned teasingly.

Penny smiled at her older sister's antics, then tilted her head. “Not so bad. Super easy, but I’m still finding ways to enjoy it.” She looked at you knowingly, then discreetly flicked her gaze to August’s firm bubble butt. Sure enough, when August turned around a second later, you could just barely spot the faint outline of a mangled tiny guy smeared onto August’s left butt cheek, glued to her yoga pants. He looked like he’d been through a lot all day.

August herself clearly had no clue, as she sauntered from the room and plopped back onto the couch. This was par for the course for August, who was as scatterbrained and unobservant as they came. She was joined a moment later by Priscilla. Only Penny lingered by your side, fighting to keep down a smug grin.

Penelope, your younger sister, was 18 years old, and one of your greatest (and only) friends besides Yumi. You’d grown up as her role model and mentor, and now she practically idolized you. Sometimes it bothered you that she was 5’9” (hence four inches taller than you), and also that she was noticeably more developed in the bodily maturity department, all while two years your junior. Still, you loved her.

You’d also passed onto her your hatred of tinies, and she’d taken it to heart even more than you had. To be totally frank, sometimes you felt that Penny as a little TOO obsessed with torturing tinies. You certainly had fun doing it, but Penny seemed to enjoy it more personally.

“He’s not the only one I got today, sis.” Penny whispered in your ear. “Until August showers later tonight, there should still be a tiny gunked up between her toes.” The faintest of blushes dappled Penny’s cheeks. “Big sis is such a great help in putting those bugs in their place, isn’t she?”

For some reason, right as Penny said that, the cut on your thumb burned a little, and you felt nauseous. Putting a hand to your head, you mumbled a half-hearted reply. “Uh huh, yeah.”

11.content:
Penny looked disappointed in that response, but recovered quickly, reverting to normal conversation. “Um, but anyway…I’m one of the lead members of the Owenton girls’ soccer team this year. I’ve also been cast as the evil queen in our school’s presentation of ‘Snow White’. That’s exciting, I guess!”

You nodded vaguely. “Sure is…ugh.” You wavered a bit, Penny instinctively reaching out to steady you before you caught yourself. “Listen, I’ve got a headache. It’s not you, though. I just need some meds before I head out.”

Penny nodded, grabbed a few different bottles from the medicine cabinet and handed them to you, and then scurried back off into the living room. She rejoined your older sister and mother. Apparently, they’d been watching a movie together.

You chugged a few different pills with a glass of water, mentally begging your body to get over itself and feel better, and then headed upstairs. Just about at random, you threw shirts, pants, and underwear into a bag to take over for the party and inevitable sleepover.

You were an independent girl, and your mother knew better than to try and keep you tied down at all times. Owenton wasn’t a massive town, so your mother gave you just about total reign over the place. You’d spent entire weeks away from home chilling at Yumi’s place with barely a word to your family. It just felt good to get away from time to time.

Trudging downstairs, you walked into the living room to announce your departure. “I’m heading out now. For the party. Could be sleeping over for the next few days.”

August and Penny nodded understandingly, but Priscilla frowned. “Oh, honey. Are you sure? What about–”

You rolled your eyes, not entirely sure what your mom was caught up on. “I’ll be fine, mom. Love you. Bye.” Without waiting, you spun on your heels and pushed through the front door, heading back outside to your car. Fighting through your pounding headache, you drove a few blocks down the road before life decided to give you a figurative middle finger.

Your car’s engine sputtered and died, stopping your car dead in its tracks in the middle of the road. Too exhausted to even swear or punch the car, you simply dialed up Angie, Owenton’s most renowned mechanic. Informing her of the issue, she promised she’d be over in a jiffy to tow your car to her shop. She was a family friend, and you trusted her, so you let her know that you’d be walking home in the meantime. Screw the party.

The stroll back home didn’t take long, but it was still killer. Your head pulsed with pain, and your stomach was flipping and twisting into knots. Your eyes prowled along the sidewalk, begging some tinies to appear so you could take your mind off the pain and have some fun. Alas, no tinies showed up. Why weren’t they ever around when you needed one? Their life was so stupid and simple, the least they could do was make yours easier.

Reaching your house again, you decided to sneak in through the back door so as to not alert your family of your presence. You knew August would tease you about not taking proper care of your car. You apparently passed your stealth check, as you silently moved upstairs without alerting anyone. It was hardly time for celebrating though, as by now you were sweating veritable buckets thanks to the fever you were now running.

Doused in sweat, you gulped down some water and stumbled into your bedroom. You stripped out of your clothes in a desperate attempt to feel cooler (as you weren’t usually one to sleep naked). Tossing your clothes into your dirty hamper, you collapsed into bed, begging sleep to grab you. As you slowly passed out into unconsciousness, your head was filled with vivid dreams. Dreams of your life finally changing, a dramatic twist of fate finally breaking you from your routine rut of boredom…

*****

If scientists were asked to explain it, it’d be unlikely that any answer they came up with would be suitable. From all knowledge known so far, it was physically impossible for anyone other than a man to be shrunken down by the shrinking virus and reduced to a tiny. In the 50-odd years since the epidemic hit, only men have been affected, and it was no general knowledge that no girls could or would ever be tiny.

However, as the night dragged on, that is exactly what happened to you. While you slept fitfully, your body reduced in size, more and more with each passing minute. Before long, you too were only about an inch tall. Your innards had changed as well, shifting and morphing into their new, proper shapes. The cells that controlled the squashing and reforming defense mechanism integrated all throughout your body, completing the transformation into a tiny.

Perhaps all the pieces had just come into place. August’s biological father was a man named Adrian who had sadly passed away from cancer just a year after her birth. Both you and Penny were born from sperm donors your mother had utilized. Penny’s secret father was a normal man living somewhere on the east coast, but what no one would ever discover is that your biological father was a tiny himself. Hence, the tiny genes had been in your blood, dormant, since the day you were born.

Also, the night’s events had served as an undeniable catalyst. The tiny you picked up off the street was not a truly ordinary tiny. His own blood was a rare mutated form of the shrinking virus. Completely normal to him, but the DNA of his blood contained molecules that were actually extremely aggressive in triggering the shrinking effects. Perhaps some of his DNA getting into your bloodstream because of his spit had kickstarted your dormant shrinking genes.

Maybe it was something else altogether, like the hodgepodge collection of medicine you’d haphazardly gulped down earlier. Maybe you’d contracted it somehow from a patron at the diner.

Or…maybe it was just fate, and its infinitely cruel sense of humor.

*****

“WHAT THE HELL!?!?” Your scream pierced the heavens, though in reality, was nothing more than a bug’s buzzing whisper.

Since waking up ten minutes prior, your brain had fought to come to terms with the reality that now faced you. Though you had first believed it a dream, pinching and then slapping yourself had not resulted in waking up. In fact, all you’d done is slightly dent your face, only for it to reform a second later. Somehow, despite the theoretical impossibility of it all, you were now a tiny. One inch in height, and malleable in nature.

You shook with horror, fighting the overwhelming urge to pass out from the fright of it all. It was only the sense of “wrongness” the spurred you onwards. This wasn’t you. You weren’t a tiny freak like all the others. You weren’t just an insignificant speck, some unnoticeable bug. Your life wasn’t worthless. YOU DIDN’T DESERVE THIS!

Crawling to the side of your bed, you slid down to the floor and then crossed your room to the door, disgusted by the fact that it took you almost five minutes to do so. The extra plush carpeting in your room was nearly a jungle to traverse. Finally, you made it, slipping under the crack in your door and out into the hallway.

Your only thought was getting help, and quick. This could be reversed; this could be fixed. You could be changed back. No way this was permanent, right? No way this was your life now. All you needed was some help.
11.title: Karma Comes Due

You dodge her hand…but end up splashing right into the tub!

111.content:
Off to your left, near the end of the hallway, you could see that the bathroom door was open, and the lights were on. You also heard the faint voice of your mother gently humming, and you recalled that she often liked to take long, hot baths in the early morning before starting her day. There was no one you trusted more than your own mother to rescue you from this nightmare, so you booked it down the hallway as fast as you could.

Of course, fast was relative at your new size. Though the hallway carpet was shorter and easier to traverse than your own bedroom, it was still not unlike running on wavy sand dunes at the beach, and you tripped and stumbled several times. It took you five minutes to even draw near the bathroom, and you were fairly out of breath by the time you actually did so.

Wiping sweat from your brow, you panted heavily to catch your breath as you meandered to the open bathroom door and looked inside the bathroom. Surprisingly, it was empty, and you realized your mistake just one second too late. Your mom’s pleasant humming started up again, frighteningly loud, and you whipped around to find her strolling from her bedroom towards the bathroom, crossing right into your path.

You froze in abject terror, the sight of your now giantess-sized mother casually walking forward more horrifying than anything you’d ever witnessed in your life. There was something about her peaceful expression and casual demeanor that contrasted so sharply with the sheer enormity of her body. You were so stunned that your brain didn’t even think to move before Priscilla’s right foot slapped into your body, her big toe impacting with your chest.

Your gut crumpled flat from the impact, and you were launched backwards, sailing into the bathroom. Your miniscule body bounced and slid along the tiled floor, deeper into the bathroom. It hurt, and the rational part of your brain quickly realized that without your newfound squishy properties, an impact like that should’ve popped you open like a grape. Like it or not (and you absolutely did NOT like it), you were now as weak and puny as all tinies, and a simple step from your mother could obliterate you with ease.

Adding insult to injury, Priscilla was wholly oblivious as to what she’d done, and she merely entered the bathroom and closed the door behind her. She then tossed the flimsy bath robe she’d been wearing aside, baring her fully nude body to the empty bathroom, and singular tiny girl. She then walked over to the tub, once more crossing near you.

Your eyes had bulged out of their sockets looking at your mother’s unbelievably gigantic curves as she took off her robe, but thankfully you had a shred of common sense that compelled you to sprint away as she came walking by. Your mom had always had a hourglass figure to die for, but from your vantage point, her massive breasts were like globe-sized mounds of flesh, and her plump booty looked fit to swallow you whole, never to release you again.

Lost in thought about what to do now, you remained on the floor while Priscilla turned the searing hot water on and began filling the tub, while simultaneously dumping a generous helping of bubbling liquid into the water as well. She continued humming her merry little tune, tapping her foot to the rhythm, and you watched with morbid fascination as your mom’s toes slapped up and down, drumming along the tiled floor.

A moment later, and your attention was caught by the sight of Priscilla’s loofah hanging over the edge of the tub, just barely touching the floor. Inspiration struck you in that moment, and you realized that it wouldn’t be hard to scale the frilly loofah up and onto the edge of the tub, which would give you a much greater vantage to get Priscilla’s attention from. Clearly, she wasn’t likely to spot you down on the floor.

Avoiding her feet by a wide margin, you reached the loofah and hopped on, your inconsequential weight not shifting it at all. Putting your lithe body and mild acrobatic talents to use, you scaled the loofah with relative ease. Once or twice your hands got tangled in the small gaps in the loofah’s composition, but it was only a minute or two by the time you flipped up onto the edge of the tub.

Catching your breath for a second, you noted that the tub was now filled to the brim with hot water and a miasma of bubbles. As if to drive this point home, Priscilla grinned and turned the water off, then moved to enter the tub without hesitating a second. This suddenness caught you off guard, and soon, your mother’s hand was racing towards you as she moved to brace herself upon entry.

The shadow of her hand moving to engulf you, your mind raced with panic.
111.title: Priscilla's Morning Bath

choices: Penny hides your container where she hopes you one will ever find it.
Penny frees you...but only because she has a horrible plan in mind.
*Writer's Choice*
1111.content:
In the last fraction of a second you had to react, you threw up your hands frantically and screamed out desperately. “WAIT! PLEASE! STOP!”

Through some miraculous means, Priscilla actually heard your tiny voice, and she withdrew her hand hastily. Glancing in confusion around the bathroom, your giantess mother’s roving gaze finally settled on your miniscule body. She titled her head in thought, and then recognition shone in her face…although it was a distant sort of recognition, and her lips curled into a disappointed frown instead of the loving care you desperately wished of her right now.

“Oh, a perverted little tiny!” Priscilla lamented aloud. “How rude of you, you little thing!” Frown deepening, your mother brought her open palm back towards your body and flung it downwards in a slapping motion.

Your hopes shattered at the same instant your body did, as your mother’s hand easily squashed your flat as paper, crumpling you down and leaving your little more than a stain on the edge of the tub. Your own caring mother had completely failed to recognize you, and the severity of your new lot in life came crashing down on you. It was overwhelming.

Settling into the tub, Priscilla moved her hand from your body, and stared at your crushed form. Her expression was one of dissatisfaction. “I mean, really. I love you tiny little things, and try my hardest to respect your rights and feelings. But then you perverted guys do things like this! It’s so depraved!”

As your mother continued to talk to you, oblivious as to your real identity, you fought valiantly to reform and pop back to normal. It was a tricky task, seeing as how you’d never had to do something so mentally exhausting in your life before now, but you began making progress after a moment. However, noticing your progress, your mother grabbed the nearest bottle of shampoo and plopped it down onto your body, keeping you flat and pinned.

“Ah, ah! No doing that silly little reinflating thing!” Priscilla tsked while shaking her finger. “You can ask my daughters, and they’ll tell you I’m a doting and friendly woman, but they will also tell you that I’m fair. AND, a tiny like yourself being punished for spying on me while I bathe is absolutely fair.” She laughed lightly. “You will stay put, little thing, and wait until I’ve finished bathing.”

Though her words were slightly muffled under the bottle of shampoo, you still mostly picked up on what she said, and her words chilled you to your core. Not only had your hopeful savior failed to recognize you, but now she was going to punish you? You were desperate to avoid this fate, but try as you might, you simply could not wiggle or squirm out from under the shampoo bottle.

Priscilla’s bath did eventually come to an end a half hour later, and your mother rose from the water like a goddess, stepping out from the tub and drying herself off. After slipping her bath robe back on, she took a cursory glance around the bathroom to make sure she hadn’t forgotten anything, and her eyes fell on the shampoo bottle balance precariously on the tub’s edge.

“Now, why is that there?” Your mother mused softly, having entirely forgotten about you thanks to her heavenly, thirty-minute bath. Grabbing the bottle and moving it, she instantly spotted your almost comically squashed body and frightened expression. Her eyes lit up. “Ah, right. My little would-be bathroom spy! Come here, you.”

Mentally freaking out, your physical body still couldn’t do a thing as Priscilla scraped you from the porcelain tub’s surface and dropped you into her palm. Through your one uncrushed eye, you noted your mother was taking you into the spare room instead of her own bedroom. Your mom often referred to the room as her ‘design studio’, and it was where she did all of her work as a freelance clothing designer. As soon as Priscilla stepped into the room, a flood of once pleasant but now horrible memories raced into your mind.

See, your mom had fully jumped on the bandwagon of a relatively small company known as Micro-Flex, which specialized in comfy clothing inspired by the stretchy and malleable qualities of tinies. She’d bought some stocks in the company years ago, and now that Micro-Flex was a huge business, and practically a household name, your mom had made bank. Of course, it wasn’t the money she cared about, but the materials.

Micro-Flex brand materials were now sold in stores across the United States, and your mom kept a constantly supply of them in her design studio at all times. She had the normal supplies one who expect, like fabric dyes and paints, brushes and threads, specialized clothing molds, and a life-size mannequin for measuring purposes. She also had crates of Micro-Flex material. The material was stretchy, malleable, and super soft to the touch. In fact, it was just about exactly like a squished tiny would be.

This is why, up until today, you’d always cherished this room of the house. You’d long lost count of the various cruel means by which you’d disposed of tinies you’d picked up off the streets. Priscilla was in her own little world inside of this room, and was laughably easy to manipulate into torturing tinies while remaining blissfully unaware. Suffice it to say, you could think of quite a few orders that your mom had made and shipped out that were a good deal more LIVELY than your traditional fabric garments.

However, now all of that was turned back on you, the newly tiny scared-out-of-her-mind girl.

Still powerless, you could only let out a mute scream as Priscilla grabbed an empty Tupperware container, pulled off the lid, and dropped you inside. Your papery form fluttered into the container, which Priscilla sealed up tightly a second later. It took you a minute or two, but you finally reformed, and you hopped to your feet and pressed up against the plastic wall, banging your pitiful fists against it.

Through your blurry vision outside the container, you watched your mom finish scribbling some words onto a sticky note, which she then taped to the top of your container. Tears now freely coming down your face, you beat your fists harder and harder into the plastic, drawing the attention of your giantess mother right as she was preparing to leave the room.

“Oh, don’t worry, little one.” Priscilla cooed. “I’m not a cruel woman, I promise. I know life can be hard for you tinies, so I’m only keeping you in there until later tonight…or perhaps tomorrow morning. Just long enough for you to think about what you’ve done.” Your mother wagged her finger at you. “I’m flattered you think a woman my age is worth spying on, but it was still a naughty thing that you did!”

Chuckling to herself, Priscilla sauntered out of the room, your panic-induced pounding on the plastic producing no sympathy from her. She merely turned off the light and closed the door, leaving you alone in total darkness inside of the design studio. Wracked with a crushing feeling of defeat, you sank to your knees and curled yourself up into a ball.

*****

Some time passed, perhaps a few hours but you couldn’t know for sure, and the door to the design studio swung open. As the lights flicked on, you pulled yourself to your feet and rubbed the tear stains from your eyes, ready to once more pour your heart into an attempt at getting Priscilla to notice you. Because, surely, it was her coming to let you free, right?

No, not in the slightest. It was none other than your sister, Penny, who strolled into the room with a happy smile and inquisitive eyes. She appeared to be scanning the room for something.

“Uh…sticky notes. Sticky notes, sticky notes…hm.” Penny mumbled to herself, turning in a circle before spotting the small pad of sticky notes beside your Tupperware prison. Grinning, your younger sister bounded over to you and scooped the pad of notes into her hand. Though she wasn’t who you had expected to see, she could still save you, so you resumed pounding your fists on the walls of the container.

Drawn by the noise, Penny glanced at the container, and she spotted the note. Peering down at it, she murmured its contents aloud as she read it. “Uh…tiny little pervert spying in bathroom…punishment is sitting in container…release at night or morning…” Your sister froze, and her jaw dropped slightly. “What the hell?”

Squatting, Penny peered inside the container right at you, and you froze under her intense scrutiny. As her face morphed into one of sadistic enjoyment, you waved your arms around and shouted at her to notice you, but it was useless. The blurry plastic casing of the container shrouded your real identity from her, and your voice didn’t even begin to reach her ears.

“So, little freak thinks it’s okay to be a perv?” Penny scoffed. “Yeah, no. See, this is why I tell mom that tinies are useless bugs. Maybe she’ll believe me one day.” Your sister ripped the sticky note from your container and crumpled it in her fist. “Anyway, won’t need this note. From what I can tell, mom’s forgotten about you already. Why not make this even more fun, then?”

Grinning maliciously at you, your confidence in being found shriveled into nothing. Somehow, just from a simple perspective change, your darling younger sister had gone from angelic sweetheart to a demon of your nightmares.

11112.content:
From inside your Tupperware prison, you could just about see the sadistic ideas dancing around in Penny’s head. Though she was still eyelevel with you, her eyes had grown cloudy and unfocused, and you knew she was devising the perfect plot to torment you with. You knew, because you’d seen the same look in her eyes hundreds of times. You knew, because Penny only thought of tinies as bugs and freaks that were hers to toy with and abuse.

You knew, because you’d taught her how to think that way.

Finally, your younger sister’s eyes flashed with excitement, and she lightly bit her lip. “Tell ya what, tiny? Would you like to come out of that container? Huh, would ya?” Penny teased, beginning to pry the lid of the container off. You violently shook your head to signify your refusal, knowing Penny was just toying with you.

This brought the smallest frown onto her angelic face, and Penny sighed. “Not going to play along? Fine. I wasn’t giving you a choice anyway.” Penny ripped the lid clean off and snatched out at you, faster than you could have ever hoped to react. Her giant hand squeezed around you in a clenching vice, and her fingers quickly went to work smoothing and flattening you out into a paper-thin disc shape. Any protest on your lips died as she squeezed your lungs into a smear.

Lying you in her palm, Penny smirked at you and snorted with laughter. “Geez, you’re so disgustingly weak. From all the way downstairs in the kitchen, you could make out the sounds of someone rummaging around. At a guess, you presumed it was August, as she was the only Hayes woman to get up and get moving this early on a Saturday. You had your reservations about relying on August for help, but figured if she was awake and alert, it wouldn’t be too bad. Plus, your stomach was growling for food, so having a bite to eat after being noticed would be nice.

With this plan in mind, you walked the rest of the length of the hallway to the stairs, and then descended down to the first floor. It was a tiring process of crawling to the edge of the step, falling down and squishing slightly, reforming, and then doing it all again for every single step. All told, it took you over five minutes to descend the stairs, then another few minutes to reach the kitchen. It was a miracle August was still there after ten minutes.

Upon entering the kitchen, your jaw dropped open in sheer shock at the sight that you saw. On a normal morning, seeing your sister saunter around the kitchen whipping up a filling meal was nothing new. But now, from your bug-sized perspective, August was a towering, gorgeous giantess, equal parts mesmerizing and alluring, as well as terrifying and incomprehensible.

All at once, you were hit with a wave of nausea as a sea of memories flooded into your head all at once. You kept staring at August, taking in her curvaceous and toned appearance, and noting her attire, which consisted of a revealing black sports bra and black compression shorts. You remembered the time where you’d discreetly slipped a tiny into her open cleavage. You recalled molding a tiny into a hair tie, then ‘gifting’ the little guy to August for her birthday. You thought of all the tinies you slapped onto her butt by pretending to just give her a friendly ‘butt pat’.

You remembered all the ways you’d used her and her oblivious, scatter-brained nature to torment tinies…and then recalled that you WERE one now. Coming to her for help was a terrible mistake.

Sadly, it was one you figured you’d have to own up to. Now that you were here in the kitchen, August was far and away the closest and easiest person to get immediate help from. Steeling your nerves, you slipped past her while she was standing by the counter, and made it to the kitchen’s tables closet leg. It was a smooth wooden leg, but with that sort of sticky, glossy feeling when you rub your hands on it.

Latching onto the leg like a little spider, you shimmied up and up and up, your arms begging you to stop, but your determined will taking you all the way to the top. From there, you used your minimal but applicable acrobatic skills to flip around the underside of the table, maneuvering from the leg and up onto the tabletop. Taking solace in your victory, your stopped to catch your breath and rub sweat off your face.

Meanwhile, August had finally finished getting her breakfast ready. She’d woken up rather early to do it, but she’d just finished whipping up some delicious pancakes, from the mix to the finished product. Sure, she’d dropped her mixing spoon on the ground three times, and she’d let half the mix pour into the drain instead of her bowl, but whatever. She’d had enough to make three thick, tasty looking pancakes, and that was enough for her.

Carelessly, she dropped the plate onto the table, accidentally jostling the top pancake off of the stack. Scrambling frantically, you crawled across the table to safety, barely avoiding being buried under the breakfast delicacy.

Heh.” Licking some mix off of her fingers, she grabbed the pancake without looking and dragged it back onto her plate, all while rummaging in the cupboard for an empty glass. She had yet to even glance at the table anywhere near your direction.

From your new vantage, watching August was like watching a slowly brewing storm of chaos. She was a whirlwind of energy that left destruction and enjoyment in its wake, in equal measure. It had always endeared people to her in the past, and she was quick to make friends because of her quirky mannerisms. As a tiny, though, August was pure, unadulterated terror, and you began to seriously consider just running from the kitchen instead.

Breakfast time, and then gym time!” She giggled, leaning over the table to grab the bottle, eyes firmly locked on it, and not your miniscule form stuck in the middle, right between the bottle and her plate. Up above, August had finished dissecting her pancake mountain, and was more than eager to dig in. Practically salivating at the filling breakfast feast she’d prepared for herself, your sister set down her knife and picked up her fork, then jabbed it into the nearest piece of pancake chunk. Her fork didn’t pierce all the way through, but it was enough to firmly dig into the chunk.

Meanwhile, your gargled and incomprehensible screams bubbled through the syrup goop as you felt four sharp metal prongs lightly scrape at your back. Stuck as you were, face-first onto the plate with the pancake above you, you were all-too aware that August had just about speared you with her fork. In doing so, she smushed and smeared your body flatter and flatter, engraining you into the doughy pancake that was squishing into you. Finally satisfied, August lifted her fork up, bringing the sopping, syrupy pancake chunk closer to her mouth. Through the haze of syrup coating you, you gazed at your giantess older sister, begging her to see you (and not fully realizing just how difficult it was to make out your tiny form by this point). You attempted to squirm or wiggle, but it was no use. Your fate was in August’s hands.

Sadly, your sister merely licked her lips and opened her mouth, her plush lips parting to reveal the dark, dank depths within. Her eyes closed in excited anticipation of her first delicious mouthful, ruining your final hope of being spotted by her. As she moved her fork closer to her mouth, and her hot breath washed over you, your mind wondered how your normal life had shattered so completely that you were reduced to this. You'd be nothing but nourishment for your older sister, and she'd never have a clue...unless something saved you in these very final moments.

A cursory look around the second-floor hallway clued you in that you’d apparently slept much later than you’d initially thought. Obviously, your family was all together downstairs, but why?

It was a tiring process of crawling to the edge of the step, falling down and squishing slightly, reforming, and then doing it all again for every single step. All told, it took you over five minutes to descend the stairs, then another few minutes to reach the kitchen. You could only hope your family hadn’t moved from the living room yet.

Sure enough, they hadn’t, and seeing them briefly took you aback, your body shaking with terror. Each of the other Hayes women were towering giantesses to your new miniscule form, stunningly beautiful paragons of attractiveness and power in equal measure. You had never felt so helpless and insignificant in your life then you did while watching them now.

For some reason, they each had a suitcase present, with your mom finishing zipping up her own, Penny already having hers on wheels by the door, and August still trying to squeeze her belongings inside. You wracked your brain for a reasonable explanation as to this behavior, but came up with nothing, walking forward while you thought.

Thankfully, Penny’s booming sigh clued you in a second later. “Man…I wish Alex was coming with us.” She said glumly, aimlessly kicking at the floor.

Your mom shook her head sadly. “I tried to ask her last night if she was sure, but she seemed more interested in the party. It’s a shame, but she’s a grown woman now. She can make her own decisions.” Priscilla reasoned.

August, trying and failing to organize her stuff suitcase, scoffed. “Can’t say that makes sense to me. I mean, who values a party over a freaking beach resort?” She laughed. “Her loss though.”

You stopped dead in your tracks, a flood of memories rushing back to you all at once. It was a pretty poor decision to stop moving and get lost in thought while so close to Penny’s aimlessly swinging foot, but your mind was wholly preoccupied at the moment.

You recalled your mother mentioning a surprise week-long trip to a famous beach resort known as ‘Seaside Sanctuary’ a day or two ago. She was prone to these spontaneous trips frequently, and in your excitement for the party, it had slipped your mind entirely. You felt a pang of guilt at unintentionally pushing family time aside for your own selfish wants, as well as a personal sense of loss. You’d never been to Seaside Sanctuary before, and heard it was heavenly.

A moment later, August jumped to her feet in a panic. “Oh crap! My favorite bikini top is still upstairs.” She grinned sheepishly. “Be right back!” She said before dashing upstairs. Penny rolled her eyes and smiled at her sister’s antics, and your mom did the same.

Locking eyes with August’s messy suitcase, Priscilla stepped forward, then nodded to Penny. “Help me with this, dear?”

Penny flashed her a thumbs up and moved from where she stood. “Sure thing, mom!” Your younger sister grinned, eyes firmly locked on Priscilla, and not on her bug-sized sister down by her feet.

You were knocked from your thoughts in the most literal sense, as Penny’s foot slapped into your body, sending you careening up into the air with a painful crushing of your stomach. You screamed for help, but your pitiful cries were drowned out by a chorus of pleasant laughter from your family.

Flipped over onto your back, you cried out again as Penny slammed her fist down into your body, trying to squeeze the pile of lingerie flatter to save space. Your body crumpled into paper, and your mind screamed in confused agony at the all-new sensation of being nothing but a squishy bug to your normal-sized sister and mother. However, before you’d even finished halfway reforming, August came bounding down the stairs and skipping into view, holding a stylish black and red bikini top in her hands. Grinning at Penny and Priscilla, she proceeded to slam the top down into her suitcase without looking, and it came down right onto you.

Your choked cry was strangled short as the top crushed you flat, and then moments later, the pressure on your miniscule body doubled as August zipped up the suitcase nice and tight. All sounds became muffled, and everything was darkness as the suitcase trundled along on its wheels, August rolling it out of the house alongside her family. You uselessly tried to wiggle free, but to no avail. You couldn’t move a muscle, and as August put her suitcase into the car, and Penny and Priscilla laid theirs on top, the weight tripled, and you felt suffocated from all sides.

No release came, no crazy coincidence saved you. The three-hour drive to Seaside Sanctuary was entirely in the cramped but ironically sweet-smelling confines of your older sister’s suitcase. You moved through the whole plethora of emotions, ranging from depressed sobbing to unjustified anger at August, back to sheer boredom of nothingness. While Priscilla checked in at the front desk, August and Penny observed the main map of the resort complex. Apparently, Seaside Sanctuary just about had it all. 1152.content:
Admittedly, it took you more than a second to recognize the person who had appeared in the doorway. The woman was towering and stunningly beautiful, with firm and abundant curves accentuated alluringly by her tight, dark blue button-up blouse and form-hugging, dark blue dress slacks. However, as you took in the sight of her strawberry blonde hair pulled back in a bun, pale skin that suggested a lot of time indoors, and trademark glasses, you pieced it together.

It was your Aunt Jenna, the 38-year-old younger sister of your mother, so of course she’d have a key to your house. Jenna had a relatively secretive job as a scientist at some biochemical lab right outside of Owenton. You recalled it being named ‘Futureworks’, or something along those lines. Though she lived only ten minutes away, you only saw her every few months, as her work kept her incredibly busy. She was a nice and caring woman, if a tad eccentric with her overly analytical and boundlessly curious nature.

You had no idea why she had stopped by, but what you did know was that she was walking right towards you, and the sight of her three-inch heels clacking against the floor steadily in your direction sent an uncontrollable panic through your body. Dashing to the side, you narrowly avoiding being reduced to a smear, and watched from the floor as Jenna approached the couch and gently sat down.

Right as Jenna sat down, she took off her glasses and produced a silky cloth from her pocket. She began to rub the lenses of her glasses to clean them. A moment later, and your older sister August meandered out of the kitchen, pancake crammed into her mouth. Spotting Jenna, she walked closer.

“Hey there auntie!” August grinned, startlingly Jenna, who proceeded to drop her glasses onto the floor.

“Goodness, Penny! You just about gave me a heart attack.” Jenna sighed, catching her breath. "Have you grown?" She inquired, and August threw her a lopsided grin, putting her hands on her hips.

“Penny? Geez, auntie. Still blind as a bat without your glasses, huh?” Your sister teased, prompting a frown and furrowed brow from Jenna. A moment later, your aunt gaped.

“Oh, you really are August, aren’t you. My apologies, darling.” Jenna grimaced and blushed. “That’s embarrassing. Yes, I am still a bumbling fool without my glasses.”

“Well, I wouldn’t say fool.” August sat down on the couch beside her. “You’re the smartest person I know. How’s all that science-y stuff going down at the lab?”

Jenna smiled coyly. “Well, you know I can’t tell you much in detail. All I can say is that it’s going well, but we’ve hit a wall. We haven’t had a tiny volunteer for trial experiments for the past month, and it’s stalling our research.”

Your older sister cooed. “Ooh, you get to play with tinies all day long! I wish that was my job!” The auburn-haired girl smiled dreamily. “I’m lucky if I get one or two in the classes I teach. And NONE when I’m coaching the girls’ swim team.” She winked at Jenna. “Ya know, because, duh! There aren’t any tiny girls. Wouldn’t that be adorable though?”

Jenna laughed, and continued her conversation with August, while down on the floor, you winced at your older sister’s unintentionally ironic statement. Still, you hoped that getting the attention of Jenna would be the easy solution to your troubles. August had spoken true in calling her smart. Jenna was a certifiable genius, and she’d surely have a way of reversing this curse you’d been inflicted with.

Reaching the floor near her feet, you paled momentarily in the presence of Jenna’s lightly tapping heels, each impacting causing the tiniest of reverberations that shook your balance. Beside her feet were her glasses, still not picked up. In your mind, you reasoned that putting yourself beside them was a surefire way to get noticed by Jenna, and secure your rescue. To this end, you crept over to her glasses and waited patiently.

A few minutes later, and August stood back up. “Well, I’m hitting the gym in a minute. It was really nice talking to you again, auntie!” She grinned, and Jenna smiled back. “I’ll go tell mom that you’re here. Hopefully you actually recognize her!” August said with a lilting laugh, and headed upstairs.

Jenna winced, and called after her. “I’m sorry, August!” She shook her head ruefully, then glanced down at her feet. “Speaking of, though, it’s about time I pick these up.”

You braced yourself for the moment of truth as your titanic giantess aunt leaned forward in her seat and reached down to the floor to pick up her glasses. Her massive hand drew nearer and nearer, eventually clasping around her glasses. As soon as it was close enough, you began beating your fists on her thumb and yelling out Jenna’s name. Surprisingly, it worked.

Jenna’s hand recoiled a bit, knocking you onto your butt in the process, and your aunt moved her face even closer to you. Her face filled the sky, and her eyes looked at you intently, blinking rapidly. Frightened out of your wits, you gave her a half-hearted wave. For some reason, Jenna showed no signs of recognizing you, and your blood ran cold as you realized she hadn’t put her glasses back on yet.

“What…is that?” Your aunt whispered, her breath blowing out your hair from the wind at this close distance. Having moved from fear to pure terror, you were too paralyzed to even think of moving, and just sat there stupidly, waiting with bated breath for what Jenna did next.

Backstory (Written by Hectic)

In an event that some called a medical mystery and others called an act of god, a type of shrinking virus spread to every corner of the earth, affecting part of the population while leaving another part completely fine. Those who fell victim to this virus rapidly shrunk down to one inch tall, but at the same time gained a strange durability and malleability that has baffled scientists and doctors alike. However, the tiny people were not ones to complain about these newfound characteristics, as they were the only things preventing their lives from being taken by a stray step or anything else of that nature. The third most interesting aspect about this inexplicable shrinking is the fact that only men seem to have suffered from it, with women across the world remaining completely unaffected.

From the first day of the shrinking event it was expected that society would change drastically, and while it definitely did, surprisingly much of it remained the same. There was no evil women’s takeover or forced servitude of the now smaller men. For the most part, many men who had a job that did not require physical labor of any kind were able to continue living somewhat normal lives. Certain laws were put into place which prevented too much malicious behavior from befalling the tiny men, but these were really only enforced when a woman would purposefully try to kill, kidnap, or otherwise torture them. The vast majority of the time women would get away with any accidents between them and the tiny guys with a small slap on the wrists.

Your Story

By now, 50 years have passed since the initial shrinking virus epidemic first swept across the globe. Humanity has adapted, and made great strides to accommodate the tiny population. Entirely separate tiny housing communities, tiny school systems, and tiny restaurants now exist in many places across the USA. Companies readily produce tiny-sized clothing and food, and the first bikes for tinies just hit the shelves (any other tiny vehicles are still a ways off). For all intents and purpose, life has adapted to the new normal, though circumstances are still far from perfect between tinies and their normal-sized counterparts.

And, of course, men continue to be the only victims of the shrinking virus, the sole gender that makes up the tiny population. Or at least...they were until today. But now, in the modest Californian town of Owenton, things are about to change forever.

Main Characters

Alexandra Hayes (You) - The main character, and 20 years old. You normally go by "Alex". You have tanned skin and a lithe, slim body, more acrobatic than athletic. You style your dirty blonde hair in wavy fall down to your neck, framing your face and bringing out your blue eyes. You know that you're still attractive, and you've been hit on before, but you're always self-conscious of your less than pronounced curves (especially in comparison to the rest of your family) and below average height (you are only 5'5"). Since graduating from Owenton High School, you've been working at the local diner "Dining Delights" as a waitress, hoping for your social vlog to take off. You detest tinies, finding them to be nothing but bugs, and will gladly toy around with one if they cross your path. You're also more than a little interested in girls.

August Hayes - Your older sister, and 26 years old. Her tanned skintone is a shade darker from her hours out in the sun, giving her an alluring presence. Her messy hair, auburn colored, is almost always tied back in a ponytail. Her hazel eyes complete the look. August is unbelievably beautiful, something you've always envied her because of. She's 6'0", fit and toned, and possesses a curvaceous body most girls your age would kill for. Somehow, August seems to be constantly unaware of her own sex appeal, and never seems to notice people staring at her sizable chest or prodigious rear end. Doesn't help that her choice in clothing is frequently tight and/or revealing.

Of course, August doesn't notice a lot of things. If there's anything you can say about your older sister, it's that she's an oblivious, scatter-brained airhead. She's liable to set her phone down on a chair, talk to you for a second, and then plop right back down on her phone, then proceed to wonder where it went for the next hour. It's pretty endearing, and aside from that, she's a hard worker and a great motivator. Those characteristics are a probable cause as to why she was hired as a gym teacher at Owenton High School, and was also appointed coach for the girl's swim team. She loves her job...almost as much as she loves tinies. Contrasting with your own sharp distaste for tinies, August finds them infinitely adorable and cute. She can hardly contain herself around them.

Penelope Hayes - Your younger sister, and 18 years old. She frequently goes by "Penny". Her skintone is tanned similarly to your own, and her blue eyes are also a mirror of your own. A key difference is in her hair: Penelope's brighter blonde tresses are much longer, and hang down like a waterfall to her mid-back. Another key difference is in the looks department. Standing at 5'9", Penny is already four inches taller than you, despite being two years younger. Penny is also a good size or two bigger than you in the chest department, and the rest of her body is similarly developed (though far from August's levels of curviness). The disparity between you and her frustrates you to no end.

That frustration is not a two-way street, however. Penny adores you, almost to an unhealthy degree. As August was away at college earning her bachelor's and then master's degree, Penny only had you to fully rely on while growing up, and she's since come to idolize you. This extends to your hatred of tinies, which Penny has wholeheartedly jumped on board with. In fact, Penny's almost fanatical with her torment of tinies, like she personally enjoys every second of it. It's extreme, even for you. Regardless, when she's not being a tiny-focused sadist, Penny performs in the Owenton High School theater productions, and she also is a member of the girls' soccer team. She just started her senior year.

Priscilla Hayes - Your mother, and 44 years old. One look at her, and it isn't hard to see where the family resemblance came from in the Hayes household. Priscilla has the same tanned skintone she passed onto her daughters. Her eyes are hazel, like August's, and her hair is a strawberry blonde color, like a mix between you and your sisters' hair colors. Priscilla keeps her hair short, in a stylish bob. She is also 5'10". Of course, one would be forgiven if they didn't notice Priscilla's hair or eyes first when looking at her. Though she's gained weight since quitting her old job to work from home, its gone to all the right places as far as most people are concerned. Your mom loves her work, especially when she utilizes the latest in Micro-Flex brand stretchy and squishy material. Priscilla is also spontaneous and energetic, prone to planning surprise family trips and trying crazy new things.

She is of Japanese descent, and has silky smooth and lightly tanned skin, brown eyes, and straight black hair with bangs that she keeps swept across her part of her face. Yumi comes from a family of wealth, and therefore is more than enough well-off to just coast through life. She's also a mischievous prankster who will never pass up the opportunity to mess with someone, but always in good fun. Similarly to August, she finds tinies to be cute, but instead of wanting to love and hold them, Yumi's first instinct is to play with them a bit, especially if it involves a prank. She tolerates your much crueler behavior towards tinies, but never participates. Currently, you see her every single week while working at "Dining Delights", since she is also a waitress there. You've had a crush on her for years now, but have been way too afraid of making your friendship weird by mentioning it to her.

Minor Characters

Aunt Jenna - Your mother's sister and your aunt, and a stunning 38 year old woman. She's similar to your mother in some ways, while different in others. Her skintone is considerably paler due to her time spent indoors every day because of her profession, but she has the same hazel eyes and strawberry blonde hair, which she keeps pulled back in a bun most of the time. She also wears glasses, and is just about blind as a bat without them. She's tall, standing at 6'0", and possesses an attractive body without being quite as absurdly bountiful as your mother. Her curves are substantial, but definitely more modest in comparison.

Jenna works in a lab just outside of Owenton, a head scientist for a biochemical company known as Futureworks. She works long and stressful hours, so even though she lives close by, you aren't able to see her much. When you do see her, she's frequently ready to party, drink, and let loose, which is her way of destressing from her job. She has an unabated fascination in tinies, finding them curious little specimens, and she's told you that Futureworks often hires tiny workers to serve in lab tests. You aren't sure what those are all about, as everything in the lab is kept top secret. Still, Jenna is a humorous and good-spirited woman, and you like spending time with her.

More to be added in the future!

Quick Rules

This story is written in primarily second person (you, your, etc.) Please keep it that way. However, if you want to write a bit from someone else's perspective, third person can work for that when needed.

Alex cannot die. She can only be squished, squashed, flattened, stretched, and anything else you think of. She will reform in time, given the chance to do so. Keep the story going!

Try not to write chapters that are exceptionally short. A bridge chapter from time to time is just fine, but too many and the story starts feeling weak.

Lastly, avoid heavily sexual/insertion content and any giant male content. Basically, just don't introduce any other guys into the story, UNLESS they too are tiny. That could be interesting (just make sure Alex is always the main character). Everything else goes.

Read, add, and enjoy!
